question: Which of the following is FALSE about abstract classes in Java

answers.a: If we derive an abstract class and do not implement all the abstract methods, then the derived class should also be marked as abstract using 'abstract' keyword
answers.c: A class can be made abstract without any abstract method
answers.d: A class can inherit from multiple abstract classes.
